a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x mu x x x x x x a x x x x TA {URU}za-ban u₂-ta-mi₃-iš UD x-KAM ina {URU}x x e-tar-ba x x x x x+x-MEŠ ina pa-na-tu₂-u-a e-ta-at-qu ma-a ke-e-le ina da-tu₂-šu₂-nu a-ta-lak e-te-te-qe {KUR}ta-bal-a.a am-mu-te {1}pi-še-er-mu {1}x+x-ku-u-ka ina IGI-ia šu₂-nu šum-ma LUGAL EN i-qa-bi an-na-ka li-mar-ku-u u₂-la-a i-si-ia lil-li-ku ina E₂ ma-dak-tu₂ u₂-pa-hu-ru-u-ni ba-si {ANŠE}u₂-ma-me-šu₂-nu x x ina pa-an ma-ni lu-ra-me-šu₂-nu
